title: An eglogue vpon the death of the right honorable Sir Francis Walsingham late principall secretarie to her Maiestie, and of her most honourable priuie councell. VVritten first in latine by Thomas Watson gentleman, and now by himselfe translated into English.
author: Watson, Thomas, 1557?-1592.
notes: A translation, by Thomas Watson, of: Meliboeus [1590] (STC 25120).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
